data.title: United Arab Republic: Subjects: Nasser correspondence, 1961: August-December
data.meta_description: This file contains Department of State memoranda regarding relations between the United States and the United Arab Republic (UAR). Also included is a copy of a letter from President of the UAR Gamal Abdel Nasser to President John F. Kennedy, discussing improved relations between the countries as a result of U.S. aid, and American foreign policy in Israel and Palestine.
data.meta_site_name: John F. Kennedy Presidential Library and Museum
data.text:
About Folder

Title

United Arab Republic: Subjects: Nasser correspondence, 1961: August-December

Collection

Papers of John F. Kennedy. Presidential Papers. National Security Files

Finding Aid | Digitized Content

Digital Identifier

JFKNSF-169-005

Folder Description

This file contains Department of State memoranda regarding relations between the United States and the United Arab Republic (UAR). Also included is a copy of a letter from President of the UAR Gamal Abdel Nasser to President John F. Kennedy, discussing improved relations between the countries as a result of U.S. aid, and American foreign policy in Israel and Palestine.

Extent / Physical Description

25 digital pages

Series

Series 01. Countries.
